comment: He doesn't answer to email. He is never available for office hours. THE ONLY MOMENT, YOU CAN SEE HIM IS DURING CLASS PERIOD, HIS OFFICE HOURS ARE FOR DECORATION!!!! He doesn't give feedbacks or any corrections for his assignments. He doesn't teach in class instead he gives the textbook and expect you to read by yourself.

Seems to not know the program. Couldn't answer any questions. Taught us next to nothing, we had to google everything. Canceled class 30% of the time, when he WAS there, he left at the start or halfway through the class. Doesn't give feedback on anything. Classmates literally decided we needed to talk to the Dean. DO. NOT. TAKE. Idk how I got an A.

Professor is someone extremely experienced in the field and knowledgeable on the topic. He relates with the students pretty well and is a very social professor. His tests are extremely fair. Doesn't have extremely strict due dates if you ask him for an extension. One of the best professors I have had at KSU where I come excited to class every day.

I took him for both statics and dynamics. His teaching style and involvement make learning these difficult subjects easier and in a way that it sticks with you outside of class. If you are struggling go to his office hours and you will understand the material after you leave there.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: Amazing Professor, He cares about you as a person and makes the complicated subjects accessible to people who don't understand the topic immediately. Take him for every class you can.

Professor Adams is by far the most engaging teacher I have ever taken. He truly cares for his students and genuinely makes you want to become an engineer. He engages with all students and makes sure to leave no one behind. I could not recommend him more for any students who have the option to take one of his courses.

Mr. Adams has a great personality that makes learning fun and easy. Do and understand the homework before lectures. Study heavy and do your half and he will provide you with all the recourses needed to understand the material.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Lots of homework--Participation matters

comment: Great teacher with a great personality. Study heavy to pass and dont hesitate to ask for help if behind.

Mr. Adams has a great personality that makes learning fun and easy. Do not hesitate to contact him if you fall behind. He actually cares and will help with any resources you need to understand the material.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Lots of homework--Participation matters

comment: DO THE HOMEWORK! I took Adams for both Statics and Dynamics and plan on taking him for Engineering Materials. He is a very understanding! Both classes were homework heavy, and the second half of lecture is spent working out those homework problems on the board. As long as you understand the homework, and aren't just Chegging it you will do fine.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring
